document_data.name: Alpharra Anabravvur
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2023-01-12 - Shipbuilders of the Sea of Fallen Stars}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Alpharra Anabravvur''' was a famed luxury shipwright from the opulent merchant city of [[Selgaunt]] in [[Sembia]], in the [[1490 DR|1490s DR]].
document_data.Description: In her mid-thirties, Alpharra was a good-looking [[albino]] woman who was blessed with sharp intellect, a cold calculating personality, wealth, and status.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Alpharra was the third-generation businesswoman who ran [[Anabravvur's]] shipbuilding workshop in Selgaunt. Her vessels were some of the largest and most luxurious ships on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
